content: Use a compatible app such as Google Authenticator for <1>Android</1> and <4>iOS</4>, or Authenticator for <8>Windows Phone</8>.

comment.text: This text provides instructions on how to set up two-factor authentication, recommending compatible authenticator apps for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone. It appears within a description area on the TFA activation page, guiding users on selecting the appropriate app for their device.

usage.context: {t("GetSuitableApp")}
